Mica has evolved to be known as the skincare alphabet of the cosmetic industry. It is called as the ‘nature’s glitter‘. It transmits and reflects light, thus providing a glowing effect resulting in a youthful skin. GMCI is the leading producer of Mica in the country. Without a doubt, it manufacturers the highest quality there is leaving a long-lasting effect.

Mica acts as a texturizer, filler and thickener. It is commonly used in concealers, blushes, eyeshadows, foundation, beauty creams and natural sunscreens. Since Mica is organic in nature, it appeals to all skin types alike with few or no side effects. It has anti-inflammatory properties that allows the skin to breathe and at the same time protects it against the environment. It makes the skin look alive by enhancing your natural features. Mineral based makeup works well against the conventional cosmetics that consists of various chemicals, oils and additives that may cause severe irritation. This is one of the major concerns when it comes to beauty products. GMCI’s mica, however, is chemical free. It is water resistant and therefore binds to oils rather than to water, altogether making it better for the skin. It also protects the skin against sun damage and doesn’t cause skin breakouts. Mica is very versatile too. When grounded into fine powder, it can be combined with various ingredients to give rise to a wide range of cosmetic products. By the looks of it, Mica has proven to be the backbone of the cosmetic industry.

Appearances tell a lot about a person. It exudes confidence, boldness and your personality as a whole. Cosmetic products are all in to get there and change the way we look at them. GMCI is drawn towards delivering high performance solutions to tackle technical problems. It focuses on customization of it’s products to give a personalized experience to it’s valuable customers.
